fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Youth, Climate Action, Communication
head_office_address: respACT - austrian business council for sustainable development Wiedner Hauptstraße 24/11
eu_initiatives: We follow legislation on corporate sustainability, but we currently do not participate in the dialogue about legislation policies.
organisation_name: respACT - austrian business council for sustainable development
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: respACT is the biggest business association for CSR and sustainable development in Austria. We support our member companies during the process of achieving social and ecological aims within their business activities. Furthermore, we are taking action in order to ensure that responsible companies are being heard by the public.
